createStartTLS

public SMTPClientTransport createStartTLS(SSLContext context,
                                          boolean failOnNoSupport)
Description copied from interface: SMTPClientTransportFactory
Create SMTPClientTransport which uses plain SMTP but switch to encryption later via the STARTTLS extension

Specified by:
createStartTLS in interface SMTPClientTransportFactory
failOnNoSupport - if true the client will throw an SMTPUnsupportedExtensionException if STARTTLS is not supported. If false it will just continue in plain mode (no encryption)
Returns:
starttlsClient
